description: Decks are the starting configurations that determine your initial cards, vouchers, and special rules for a run.

decks.unlock_condition: Discover at least 20 items from your collection
Discover at least 50 items from your collection

decks.effect_en: At end of each Round: $2 per remaining Hand, $1 per remaining Discard, Earn no Interest
decks.effect_zh: 每回合結束：剩餘出牌次數每次 $2，剩餘棄牌次數每次 $1，無利息
decks.unlock_condition: Discover at least 75 items from your collection

decks.effect_zh: +1 小丑欄位，每回合 -1 出牌次數
decks.unlock_condition: Discover at least 100 items from your collection

decks.effect_en: Start run with the Crystal Ball voucher and 2 copies of The Fool
decks.effect_zh: 起始擁有水晶球增益券和 2 張愚者塔羅牌
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with the Red Deck on any difficulty

decks.effect_en: Start run with the Telescope voucher, -1 consumable slot
decks.effect_zh: 起始擁有望遠鏡增益券，-1 消耗品欄位
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with the Blue Deck on any difficulty

decks.effect_en: Spectral cards may appear in the shop, start with a Hex card
decks.effect_zh: 幻靈牌可能出現在商店，起始擁有詛咒幻靈牌
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with the Yellow Deck on any difficulty

decks.effect_en: Start run with no Face Cards in your deck
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with the Green Deck on any difficulty

decks.effect_en: Start run with 26 Spades and 26 Hearts in deck
decks.effect_zh: 起始牌組有 26 張黑桃和 26 張紅心
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with the Black Deck on any difficulty

decks.effect_en: Start run with Tarot Merchant, Planet Merchant, and Overstock vouchers
decks.effect_zh: 起始擁有塔羅商人、星球商人、庫存過剩增益券
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with any deck on Red Stake difficulty or harder

decks.effect_zh: +2 手牌上限，-1 小丑欄位
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with any deck on Green Stake difficulty or harder

decks.effect_en: After defeating each Boss Blind, gain a Double Tag
decks.effect_zh: 擊敗每個 Boss 盲注後，獲得雙倍標籤
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with any deck on Black Stake difficulty or harder

decks.effect_en: Balance Chips and Mult when calculating score for played hand, X2 base Blind size
decks.effect_zh: 計分時平衡籌碼和倍率，盲注底分 X2
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with any deck on Blue Stake difficulty or harder

decks.effect_en: All Ranks and Suits in deck are randomized
decks.effect_zh: 牌組中所有點數和花色隨機化
decks.unlock_condition: Win a run with any deck on Orange Stake difficulty or harder

notes: Each deck provides unique starting conditions or rules
Some decks have both advantages and disadvantages
Decks are unlocked by completing runs or discovering collection items
Higher stakes require completing runs with previous decks
